remarks: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzmhm.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzmhm.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzmhm.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzmhm.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( G MndHom H ) ) $.
gsumzmhm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzmhm.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzmhm.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzmhm.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzmhm $p |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( K o. F ) ) = ( K ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
